text:
50 design prompts from ex-Warner designer (Nano Banana Pro)

Hi.  I'm Amir. 
Designer & creative director for 10+ years.

Did branding and ads for Warner Music, PepsiCo, Spotify.

Now I mix that experience with AI to make high-quality visuals fast.  
This article is your quick catalog to do so, too. For $0.

---

Below are all my best shared prompts and workflows, grouped by type.  
I build consistent design tools you can steal and use right away.  

Save it. Come back when you need something specific.
Links go straight to the original posts with full prompts/details.

---

## ğŸ“‹ Table of prompts by category:

1. Branded products

2. Brand identity systems

3. 3D objects

4. Posters & illustrations

5. Icons

6. Mockups

7. Apparel & fashion design

8. Custom typography

9. Bonus & freebies ğŸ

---

# 1. Branded products

> Description:
Product concepts by brands - built from scratch or re-imagined by AI.
Just change the [BRAND NAME] in a prompt and click "Generate".
AI will do the rest.

## 1. Creative product concepts

[Embedded Tweet: https://x.com/i/status/2002029348132721016]

[Embedded Tweet: https://x.com/i/status/2002793794975273279]

[Embedded Tweet: https://x.com/i/status/2004241867085406717]

---

# 2. Brand identity systems

> Description: branding - from creating brand-guidelines (concepts) to re-branding and brand re-imagination workflows.

## 7. Brand kit from one prompt

[Embedded Tweet: https://x.com/i/status/2018348054789640565]

## 9. Glass logos

[Embedded Tweet: https://x.com/i/status/1995542490049290680]

## 10. Brand logos made with a crowd

[Embedded Tweet: https://x.com/i/status/1979641387734945797]

## 11. Product branding workflow

[Embedded Tweet: https://x.com/i/status/2016631038307418366]

---

# 3. 3D objects

> Description: 3D imitations with high-realist looks.

## 12. Dark metallic logos

---

# 4. Posters & illustrations

> Description: graphic design at its finest - design & create illustrations like a pro in 1 prompt.

## 17. Photo grid tribute poster

## 5. Icons

## 7. Typography design

> Description: fonts, lettermarks, and more auto-typography.

## 45. Calligraphic monogram

[Embedded Tweet: https://x.com/i/status/2009341341226942853]

# 50. Swiss design typographic poster

[Embedded Tweet: https://x.com/i/status/1999038204692083196]

---

# BONUS

Want more value?

## GET MY FREE & PRO DIRECTOR'S PRODUCTS:

Grab them here: https://amirmushich.link/pinned

---

## Quick polish tips after generation:

What I usually do next to make the asset client- or social-ready:

1. Upscale for sharpness â†’ Magnific.ai / LetsEnhance.io / Topaz Gigapixel AI

2. Remove background â†’ remove.bg

3. Final cleanup & layout â†’ Figma / Photoshop
(add text, adjust spacing, export PNG/SVG for social)

---

Want full step-by-step threads on any of these (Figma polish, pitch deck builds, best upscalers 2026, etc.)?

I'll drop them soon - follow @AmirMushich to catch the series.
